Class OfficerEnquiryService

Object
OfficerEnquiryService
public class OfficerEnquiryService extends Object
Service class for handling HDB officer enquiry operations

    • addReply

      public boolean addReply(String enquiryId, HDBOfficer officer, String replyContent)
      Adds a reply to an enquiry
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry
      officer - The HDB officer adding the reply
      replyContent - The content of the reply
      Returns:
      true if reply added successfully, false otherwise
